metadata.title: CVE-2022-1705 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Acceptance of some invalid Transfer-Encoding headers in the HTTP/1 clientin net/http before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows HTTP request smugglingif combined with an intermediate server that also improperly fails toreject the header as invalid.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1705` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~18.04.4
No subscription required

golang-1.16 - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm1
golang-1.16-go - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm1
golang-1.16-src - 1.16.2-0ubuntu1~18.04.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

golang-1.13 - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~18.04.4+esm1
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~18.04.4+esm1
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1~18.04.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
